str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Perhaps remotely derived from the base of basis; to lift, literally or figuratively.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
A burden; the freight of a ship. Diminutive of phortos; an invoice, i.e. a task or service.
